text:
@realDonaldTrump Hypocrite.

More than 3 innocent CHILDREN have been killed by your administration ~ in your own concentration camps.

Your refusal to instigate a federal response to COVID-19 has, effectively killed over 140,000 Americans.

Your police forces continue to murder Black people.
